channel.title: Tils on Tils and bookmarks
channel.description: Recent content in Tils on Tils and bookmarks

item.title: Home til
item.description: A single-line CSS transform is all it takes to change the orientation of an image (or any DOM element, really). For instance, if I have an image that is on its side, I can use the following rotate transform to orient it correctly. 1 2 3 img { transform: rotate(90deg); } It takes an angle which can be specified in degrees. Here I use 90deg. If I was going for a different effect, I could do something like 45deg.
